creditline: Gift of Dennis Adrian in honor of Mary Cullen and in memory of Roy Cullen
description: both images mounted together in frame: upper image (a): triangular mask-like face with geometric details and squinting eyes, within eyelike, almond-shaped form; form has black background with scattered stars and arrows; 3 differently patterned bands across top and bottom edges; title at top; rendered in black and red lower image (b): diamond-shaped face with linear decorations above squinted eyes within center of larger flower-motif; center of flower is black with scattered stars and arrows; geometric and floral patterns in the petals; rendered in black and red; title across top
inscription:
(a): Titled along top edge of sheet in ink:I AM FOUR EYES FROM THE PLANET CALLED THE RED TORNADO
(b): Titled across top edge of sheet in ink: I AM BLIND AND I CAN SEE YOUR FUTURE FROM MY PLANET LOVELY
medium: Ballpoint pen and crayon on brown paper; diptych
provenance: Dennis Adrian, Seaside, Oregon, until 2017; given to MIA.
signed: (a) signed, URC: H Clark | (b) signed, URC: H Clark
title: I am Four Eyes from the Planet Called the Red Tornado / I am Blind and I Can See your Future from my Planet Lovely
